alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Essex (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Caledonia and southern Essex Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barnet, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Johnsbury, Lyndon, Guildhall, Waterford, Gilman, Granby, Kirby, Victory, Barnet, Concord, Lunenburg, Peacham, Lower Waterford, Danville, East Haven, Burke, Ryegate, St. Johnsbury Center, Concord Corner and West Waterford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 91 between mile markers 123 and 135. Interstate 93 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
